class.name: ColorPicker
class.brief_description: A widget that provides an interface for selecting or modifying a color.
class.description: A widget that provides an interface for selecting or modifying a color. It can optionally provide functionalities like a color sampler (eyedropper), color modes, and presets. [b]Note:[/b] This control is the color picker widget itself. You can use a [ColorPickerButton] instead if you need a button that brings up a [ColorPicker] in a popup.

method.name: add_preset
method.description: Adds the given color to a list of color presets. The presets are displayed in the color picker and the user will be able to select them. [b]Note:[/b] The presets list is only for [i]this[/i] color picker.

method.name: add_recent_preset
method.description: Adds the given color to a list of color recent presets so that it can be picked later. Recent presets are the colors that were picked recently, a new preset is automatically created and added to recent presets when you pick a new color. [b]Note:[/b] The recent presets list is only for [i]this[/i] color picker.

method.name: erase_preset
method.description: Removes the given color from the list of color presets of this color picker.

method.name: erase_recent_preset
method.description: Removes the given color from the list of color recent presets of this color picker.

method.name: get_presets
method.description: Returns the list of colors in the presets of the color picker.

method.name: get_recent_presets
method.description: Returns the list of colors in the recent presets of the color picker.
